channel.title: CSS: Hover Divs [IMG Included]

item.title: CSS: Hover Divs [IMG Included]
item.dc:creator: @mconur mconur
item.description:
@mconur wrote:

Try adding this:

.main_news:hover { background: #f5f8fa; }

.dashboard:hover { background: #f5f8fa; }

Reason: You only made it light up one div, and that was the .images div, if you also add the :hover to main_news and .dashboard this would hover the whole thing

Read full topic

item.title: CSS: Hover Divs [IMG Included]
item.dc:creator: @Frantix Frantix
item.description:
@Frantix wrote:

When I hover over my div it doesnâ€™t fully light up, what would be causing this? Ask if you need the code :S

I wanted it to hover fully up to the top border Thanks <3

[code=html4strict]

[/code] 
.images {
max-width: 1024px;
text-align: center;
border-bottom: 1px solid #e8e8e8;
}

.images:hover {
background: #f5f8fa;
}

.main_box {
margin-top: 50px;
}

.images img {
width: 350px;
margin: 15 auto;
border-radius: 5px;
}

.main_news {
margin-top: 50px;
width: 590px;
position:absolute;
top:10px;
right: 185px;
min-height: 20px;
padding: 12px 0 12px 0;
background-color: #fff;
border: 1px solid #e8e8e8;
border-radius: 10px;
}
.dashboard {
margin-top: 100px;
width: 590px;
float: right;
}

Read full topic
